articles.author: Andrew Jones
articles.title: Thruster issues delay BepiColombo probe's Mercury arrival until November 2026 - Space.com
articles.description: The European-Japanese spacecraft had been slated to reach Mercury in December 2025.
articles.content: The joint European-Japanese BepiColombo spacecraft is set for a Mercury flyby late on Wednesday (Sept. 4), but thruster issues mean the probe faces a lengthy delay before entering orbit around the so… [+3301 chars]
